mapper.sql: emerid, emername, emerno, happentime, emerdescribe, inaddress, note, emertypeid
mapper.select: select * from emergency e where e.emerid in (select u.emerid from uerelation u where u.userid=#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and u.state='1')
mapper.insert: insert into emergency (emerid, emername, emerno, happentime, emerdescribe, inaddress, note, emertypeid) values (#{emerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{happentime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{emerdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emertypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into emergency
emerid,
emername,
emerno,
happentime,
emerdescribe,
inaddress,
note,
emertypeid,
#{emerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{emername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{emerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{happentime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{emerdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{emertypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update emergency
emername = #{emername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emerno = #{emerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
happentime = #{happentime,jdbcType=DATE},
emerdescribe = #{emerdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inaddress = #{inaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emertypeid = #{emertypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where emerid = #{emerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update emergency set emername = #{emername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emerno = #{emerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, happentime = #{happentime,jdbcType=DATE}, emerdescribe = #{emerdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inaddress = #{inaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emertypeid = #{emertypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where emerid = #{emerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
